text: ==List== *God does not pay every Saturday. *When the sun shines on me I think but little of the moon. *Tell the truth and make thyself scarce. *The just man laughs and the guilty hides himself. *No trade without tools. *Where right is of no use wrong will not avail. *Who does not keep a cat keeps mice. *No resolution without discussion. *The miser ends by giving more, and the lazy man by going further. *What is play to horses is death to donkeys. ==References== ==Sources== * (Public Domain) ==External links== Category:Serbian language
title: Serbian proverbs
